'''Orphan kid 2''' is a background character in the [[Season 3|third season]] who debuts in "[[Valar Dohaeris]]."
sections.Biography:
===Background===
This child is an orphan living at an orphanage in [[King's Landing]].

===[[Season 3]]===
The orphanage he is living at is visited by [[Margaery Tyrell]] as she passes through the streets of [[Flea Bottom]]. While there Margaery promises to look after all the orphans at the orphanage.<ref>"[[Valar Dohaeris]]"</ref>
